reviews.review: This was a fun game, I don't know how they could ruin it so much. The game is unfriendly to new players. Killer games are to easy low mmr and not fun still high mmr. As a survivor ever game is either a complete stomp is 5 min or I have to try hard it with friends to get anywhere. I enjoyed the game because it was relaxing change of pace. Now it is just a angry fiasco.
yes

As long as you can get by the toxicity this is a great game. If you easily get mad at others in games this one probably wont be fun for you, but if you're somebody who's completely chill and doesn't care or just too good, this is one of the best games I've played.

This is a big hit in my friend group, but there are some killers that just ruin the fun. Most killers/survivors are pretty well balanced, but some (although VERY well designed) have moves that ensure the only way you're escaping is via hatch. If there was a bit more of a cooldown, it could make a world of a difference.

Sometimes the game can be a bit frustrating, but overall it's quite fun. I play mostly as a killer, and it hasn't been terribly hard to catch up to other players in skill. I have lots of experience with the mobile version of the game, so I've been able to apply that existing knowledge here. I suppose that could give me a better shot compared to most new players, but who knows. I just enjoy the thrill of chasing others and trying my best to slow their progress toward escape.
would never ever and i mean ever want anyone to play this game. It makes you so damn mad and pulls you in even more. I regret ever playing this game.

This game use to be fun, but with the recent update not so much. If your planning on maining killer go for it, you'll probably have a blast and get a 4k almost all the time. Survivor side is hot poo poo now. Solo que is literally impossible, the killers are so sweaty now that the game will be done in 5 minutes, you wont even finish a gen unless everyone's touching it. And if your "lucky" and get put with a swf they'll just leave you hanging because you're a lose end that doesn't know whats going on. I always played this game casually, never bullied killers, just wanted to have fun and see if we all make it, it always felt like a 50 50 if Id make it. Now it feels like you gotta sweat it up and even if you get to 1 gen, or end game your probably the last one alive and going to die anyways.

I never wanted to breed with anyone more than I want to with Jill Stingray. That perfect, curvy body. Those flat breasts. The child bearing hips of a literal goddess. It honestly fucking hurts knowing that I'll never mate with her, pass my genes through her, and have her birth a set of perfect offspring. I'd do fucking ANYTHING for the chance to get Jill pregnant. A N Y T H I N G. And the fact that I can't is quite honestly too much to fucking bear. Why would Sukeban Games create something so perfect? To fucking tantalize us? Fucking laugh in our faces?! Honestly guys, I just fucking can't anymore. Fuck

Pelo amor de Deus a Behaviour não acerta uma nos balanceamentos do jogo. Cara, será que tem alguém da equipe que joga o jogo mesmo? Eles buffaram os killers, o que era realmente necessário, mas pesaram a mão fazendo isso. Velho, diminuiram os tempos de interação do killer com o ambiente E AUMENTARAM O TEMPO DE FAZER GERADOR. Mataram perks de survivor que era só nerfar um pouco ou deixar mais situacional. Tanatofobia foi a coisa mais imbecil que já fizeram se pensa em todos esses buffs dos killers e nerfs nos geradores. Cara é simplesmente imoral e até meio ignorante de como o próprio jogo funciona. É um imenso absurdo só de pensar. Não consigo acreditar que uma equipe aprovou tudo isso (ainda mais com a lerdeza que é fazerem um hotfix ou decidirem mudar algo no jogo).

I wanna thank bhvr for this game, I always had an immunity to sleep meds and had a really bad problem with insomnia, but this game completely knocks me out every time I get into a match. dev team, you have created the most mid-pilled game i've ever played, and if that wasn't your original goal when developing and updating this pile of roach hymen over the last 6 years, I'd be absolutely speechless. Utterly terrible piece of virtual torture. But i'm addicted, so I can't uninstall

I can take trash talk but when 9/10 matches have people feeling some type of way in chat it really makes the matches not fun for killer. I will not fault killers for tunneling after my experience, its pretty much engineered to be toxic to opposing players.

16年就开始关注这个游戏了，也算见识过几乎所有版本。除开zzz是真不会做平衡，人屠矛盾比较严重，单排人坐大牢，屠夫被车队薄纱，摆烂人增多这些事情，这游戏的可玩性还是较高的。在不同的场景进行追逐，真的别有一番风味，博弈也是这游戏的一大乐趣之一，还有各式各样的穿搭，能选择你喜欢的多种技能搭配，希望玩这个游戏时保持乐观的心态（虽然我老是破防），而且开黑能整很多好活（就是苦了屠夫

Jogar essa merda é um caminho sem volta... Quando joguei pela primeira vez, não percebi mas eu ja estava preso nos Trials... Hoje em dia sou um servo da Entidade e não consigo fugir, estou em um eterno Looping!

bom, vamo lá. eu comprei esse jogo em 2020 e não pude aproveitar muito daquele ano por problemas no pc, mas como esse ano resolvi definitivamente, pude ficar bem imersa no jogo, e o jogo tem muitos pontos positivos. a mecânica é legal, a variedade de Killers é legal pacas, Survivor nem tanto porque não muda muita coisa de qualquer jeito. em suma, pontos que todos elogiam, e como você imagina, o ponto negativo é justamente sua comunidade, em especial Streamers e jogadores de rank alto (Ouro 2 pra cima), estes que costumam cismar com qualquer coisa que você tenha feito na partida, sendo Killer ou Survivor (de Killer é mais frequente). infelizmente não tem como resolver, se você for jogar, tenha em mente que alguma hora você vai passar por uma situação bem desagradável. no geral, jogo muito bom, recomendo 🛐

I am a bit disappointed with the more recent patch of 6.1 that has been released.  This was a great game to play with friends but they cater too much to cry baby killers where a good killer just completely destroys you without any chance to the point where it is just simply a waste of time to even play.  I don't mind losing as you can't win every game, but the fun is gone and it is just near impossible to even get a good long game going.  It is clear that they need to hire someone for balancing their game; a dozen small buffs all at once (even on paper just reading the patch notes it looked like way too much) created a massive buff to killers.  

A good system was going - the company would release any new killer overpowered a few weeks to increase sales and we all accepted that to keep the game running before they would not be as overpowered, but now every killer is overpowered and the game is no longer fun.  

If you are looking to play with friends, I am not so sure this is the game anymore.  As a solo player, well not you can completely dominate every single game even if you are clueless so go ahead and buy and enjoy it while it lasts.

I honestly loved the game but now that dead hard is trash and ds is basically gone, its no fun. 80 percent of the time you get tunnel off or camped on hook. I feel they do nothing to killers but make them stronger and us weaker. Idk its no fun anymore, Just gonna wait and until they do something to help us out and not killers.
